PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tactical/Appended/Flared/Alloy + Subsistence + Swash/Demo/Headstone/Harmony/Surrounded

Headstone makes this sidearm excellent when combined with a proper character stasis build, offering easy crystals without ability usage to either break or stand next to depending on your build

PvE: Model 8 Red + Tac/Appended Mag + Subsistence/Threat Detector + OfA/KC

The medium zoom scopes add +3 / 4 to zoom which has a massive impact on damage drop off. Model 8 Red pushes it to 17 zoom which makes this the best in slot SMG by a long shot (get it? Because it has more range?) pushing a 60 stat SMG to 20M base range.

PvP: Model 8 Red + Accurized + KW/DSR/Qd + KC/Iron Reach

The medium zoom scopes add +3 / 4 to zoom which has a massive impact on damage drop off. Model 8 Red pushes it to 17 zoom which makes this the best in slot SMG by a long shot (get it? Because it has more range?) pushing a 60 stat SMG to 20M base range.

Deciding between Kill Clip and Iron Reach comes down to deciding what you want your smg to be. Iron Reach gives it an extra 3m of range (and with smgs, every metre counts) making it a better dueling weapon, while Kill Clip’s damage buff gives it a nutty ttk and an excellent snowball machine

PvP: Hitmark/Truesight/Steadyhand/Fastdraw + Ricochet/High Cal/Armour Piercing + Firmly Planted/Killing Wind + Iron Reach/Elemental Capacitor/MKC

Despite Iron Reach greatly increasing the range, this gun has to stand up against the stat monster that is Palindrome. Even while fully statted into Range, it loses to Pali by 3m. While this might be an alternative for those who dislike the zoom that Rangefinder gives, it’s better off being used on an Arc Subclass with Elemental Capacitor for a huge Handling stat or relegated to the trash

PvP: Hammer Forged/Fluted/Corkscrew/Full Bore + Ricochet/High Cal/Armour Piercing + Snapshot + Opening Shot

With nearly 60 range it almost caps out on the maximum aim assist that snipers get, and with Full Bore it reaches 100 range, adding to that cone optimisation. This sniper will get you kills you wouldn’t believe would hit, if you can only get past the telescope zoom

PvE: Fluted/Corkscrew/Hammer Forged + Tac/Appended/Flared + Surplus/ALH + Rampage/MKC/Wellspring

This weapon has the same “bugged” reticle as Gridskipper (it moves a whole lot as you strafe). It may bother you, it may not. But if the weapon feels off, that is why.

PvE: Hard/Quick Launch + Spikes + Field Prep/ALH + Ambitious Assassin

Spike grenades benefit from reduced blast radius as that shifts more damage to impact damage. Velocity barrels are acceptable, but avoid Confined Launch and Volatile Launch if using spike grenades.

PvP: Confined/Volatile/(Linear/Quick) + Proximity Nades + Threat Detector + Quickdraw/Rampage

Inverse of Spikes, we want increased blast radius when using Proximity Grenades - but not at the cost of other stats.

PvE: Hard/Quick Launch + Spikes + Field Prep/ALH + Ambitious Assassin

PvE: Hitmark/Fastdraw/Steadyhand/Truesight + Tactical/Flared + Outlaw + Kill Clip/Explosive Payload/Timed Payload

Crimils is currently the max range 120 HC with RF and KC/Playload. However, the actual range benefits are pretty marginal since 40M is baseish range for 120s. You can go all in on range, but its not really necessary.

PvP: Hitmark/Fastdraw/Steadyhand/Truesight + Accurized + Rangefinder/Moving Target + Explosive/Timed/Opening Shot/Kill Clip

Crimils is currently the max range 120 HC with RF and KC/Playload. However, the actual range benefits are pretty marginal since 40M is baseish range for 120s. You can go all in on range, but its not really necessary.

One of two 120 handcannons which can still 2 tap.
